Class XPathEnvelopedSignatureTransform

eu.europa.esig.dss.xades.reference.XPathEnvelopedSignatureTransform
All Implemented Interfaces:
DSSTransform, Serializable
public final class XPathEnvelopedSignatureTransform extends XPathTransform
The simple enveloped signature transform. WARN: cannot be used with parallel signatures!
